name: Very rusty leggings
data: It increases the users strength a good amount.
It increases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (poor in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
